  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1917</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Jennifer Lopez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jennifer Lopez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jennifer Lopez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jennifer Lopez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jennifer Lopez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ιεννηφερ Lopez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jennifer Lopez</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for beginner English students, where the student learns and then answers questions about Jennifer Lopez and writes her a letter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">celebrities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer des Anfängers, in denen der Kursteilnehmer und dann 
erlernt, Fragen über Jennifer Lopez beantwortet und ihr einen Brief 
schreibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais de débutant, où l'étudiant apprend et puis 
répond à des questions au sujet de Jennifer Lopez et lui écrit une 
lettre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses do novato, onde o estudante aprende e então 
responde a perguntas sobre Jennifer Lopez e escreve-lhe uma letra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi del principiante, in cui l'allievo impara ed allora 
risponde alle domande circa Jennifer Lopez e gli scrive una lettera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές αρχαρίων, όπου ο σπουδαστής μαθαίνει 
και απαντά έπειτα στις ερωτήσεις για τη Jennifer Lopez και 
της γράφει μια επιστολή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses del principiante, donde el estudiante aprende y 
entonces contesta a preguntas sobre Jennifer Lopez y le escribe una 
letra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berühmtheiten</string>
          </keyword>
